about_the_game:
I know what you're thinking, just another video game soundtrack with weird ambiences and that one song your heard on the radio.
Yes, we are THAT famous.
But also, there's nothing boring about this very fine original soundtrack.
Our esteemed audio boffins listened to countless hours of mega man 2 as children to give you this uniquely inspired audio experience.
Yes, we are THAT riveting.
Let's face it, you didnt come here to screw around, you came to listen - To music most glorious!
So grab a download, dim the lights, and sip your juice.

Fruit Power 4EVER!

~morgopolis studios
